verses.text: \w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w of|strong="G0026"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G0026"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* charity, \w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w am|strong="G2192"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G1096"\w* sounding brass, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* tinkling \w cymbal|strong="G2950"\w*.

Charity \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w patient|strong="G3114"\w*, \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w kind|strong="G5541"\w*: charity envieth \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, dealeth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* perversely; \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* puffed up;

\w Is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* ambitious, seeketh \w not|strong="G3756"\w* her \w own|strong="G1438"\w*, \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w provoked|strong="G3947"\w* \w to|strong="G2212"\w* anger, thinketh \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*;

Charity \w never|strong="G3763"\w* falleth \w away|strong="G2673"\w*: \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w prophecies|strong="G4394"\w* \w shall|strong="G1100"\w* be made void, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w shall|strong="G1100"\w* \w cease|strong="G3973"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w shall|strong="G1100"\w* be destroyed.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w I|strong="G3753"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, \w I|strong="G3753"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, \w I|strong="G3753"\w* understood \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, \w I|strong="G3753"\w* thought \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*. But, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w I|strong="G3753"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w I|strong="G3753"\w* \w put|strong="G1096"\w* \w away|strong="G2673"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*.
